value:
$WmMPID_行楽フェリシア,ch05_15_Felicia_F_Picnic19,Face|Ta-daaa! The best picnic lunch ever,
made special for this very picnic by
yours truly! Want to try?$k$p$WmMPID_行楽ルカ,ch10_15_Luka_M_Picnic19,Face|Yes, please! Don't mind if I do.$k$p$WmMPID_行楽レオン,ch05_24_Leon_M_Picnic19,Face|You don't know what you're getting
yourself into. In case you haven't
heard, Felicia's dishes are famous...$k$p...ly bad.$k$p$WmMPID_行楽フェリシア,ch05_15_Felicia_F_Picnic19,Face|Lord Leo! How could you be so
cruel? I do succeed SOMEtimes,
you know!$k$p$WmMPID_行楽レオン,ch05_24_Leon_M_Picnic19,Face|Sometimes. Perhaps.$k$p$WmMPID_行楽ルカ,ch10_15_Luka_M_Picnic19,Face|This is...completely unlike anything
I've ever eaten—but I like it!$k$p$WmMPID_行楽フェリシア,ch05_15_Felicia_F_Picnic19,Face|Really? You mean it?! Well, there's
plenty more where that came from!
So, please, help yourself!$k$pYou too, Lord Leo. I even brought
some tomatoes I prepared just for
you, so you HAVE to try them!$k$p$WmMPID_行楽レオン,ch05_24_Leon_M_Picnic19,Face|Then it appears I have no choice.
It can't kill me to try one, I suppose...$k$p

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_行楽レオン,ch05_24_Leon_M_Picnic19,Face|Wh-what is that?! You've somehow
combined the textures of slime and...
dust! And what's this film on top?$k$p...You say that was a TOMATO?$k$p$WmMPID_行楽フェリシア,ch05_15_Felicia_F_Picnic19,Face|Oh no... I'm so sorry, Lord Leo!$k$p$WmMPID_行楽ルカ,ch10_15_Luka_M_Picnic19,Face|I've had some strange meals during
my time deployed, and I'll tell you
one thing, Felicia...$k$pYour cooking puts raw wheat flour to
shame—so it's good enough for me!$k$p$Sbs150|
